definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

sentences.english: Gemengda Polaroid light chuckle, but no one o'clock refused to mean.
sentences.chinese: 戈明達寶麗輕笑道，卻沒有一點要拒絕的意思。

sentences.english: Minta is a Christian, and belief is the greatest power he relies upon when creating works.
sentences.chinese: 身爲基督徒的莊明達，信仰是他創作最大的力量。

method of counting (e.g. decimal or Roman numbers)
to be neither too familiar nor too distant/to keep sb at arm's length
to have no other choice/to be the last resort

definition: one's four limbs/two arms and two legs
